---
title: "BITS"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
#load in DataFrame
data=read.csv('~/Desktop/BITS Data including head movement corrected.csv')

#run mixed effect model
library(nlme)
data$BITS..PRE1.vs.Post2.<-as.integer(data$BITS..PRE1.vs.Post2.)
model= lme(ACC ~ HD1.vs.HC0 + BITS..PRE1.vs.Post2. + HM, random = ~1 | Subject, data = data) 
summary(model)
install.packages(sj)

library(ggplot2)
# refine datafame to better fit ggplot call
data$BITS..PRE1.vs.Post2.<-as.factor(data$BITS..PRE1.vs.Post2.)
ggplot(data,aes(x=BITS..PRE1.vs.Post2.,y=ACC,
              alpha=HD1.vs.HC0))+
  guides(alpha = guide_legend(override.aes = list(fill = "darkgray")))+
  geom_boxplot()
ggsave("SO50505290.png")
# pretty call
ggplot(data,aes(group=BITS..PRE1.vs.Post2.,y=ACC,fill=BITS..PRE1.vs.Post2.))+geom_boxplot()+theme_minimal()
```
